exhibits.title: Joan Jonas: Good Night Good Morning
exhibits.description: A major retrospective of the pioneering performance and video artist Joan Jonas, spanning her five-decade career and featuring iconic works alongside new commissions.

exhibits.title: Picasso: A Cubist Commission in Brooklyn
exhibits.description: This exhibition explores Picasso's ambitious decorative scheme created for the Hamilton Easter Field's Brooklyn home, reuniting works separated for over a century.

exhibits.title: Siena: The Rise of Painting 1300-1350
exhibits.description: A groundbreaking exhibition examining the revolutionary artists of early Renaissance Siena, featuring masterpieces rarely seen outside Italy.

exhibits.title: Gego: Measuring Infinity
exhibits.description: The first major U.S. retrospective of Gego, the Venezuelan-German artist known for her innovative sculptural installations made from wire and metal.

exhibits.title: Edges of Ailey
exhibits.description: An immersive exhibition celebrating the life and legacy of Alvin Ailey, blending visual art, dance, and archival materials.

exhibits.title: Death to the Living, Long Live Trash
exhibits.description: A provocative exhibition featuring contemporary artists who transform discarded materials into powerful statements about consumption and waste.

exhibits.title: Sharks
exhibits.description: Dive into the world of sharks with life-sized models, interactive displays, and the latest scientific discoveries about these ancient predators.

exhibits.title: Invisible Worlds
exhibits.description: Experience the reopening of the landmark Hayden Planetarium with a stunning new space show narrated by Lupita Nyong'o.

exhibits.title: Space Shuttle Pavilion
exhibits.description: Get up close with the Enterprise, NASA's prototype space shuttle, in this permanent exhibit exploring America's space program.

exhibits.title: NYC's Housing Crisis: Past, Present, and Future
exhibits.description: An examination of New York City's ongoing housing challenges, tracing the roots of the crisis and exploring potential solutions.

exhibits.title: Beatrix Potter: Drawn to Nature
exhibits.description: Explore the artistic legacy of Beatrix Potter, from her beloved children's book illustrations to her lesser-known botanical and scientific drawings.

exhibits.title: Medieval Treasures: Illuminated Manuscripts
exhibits.description: A stunning display of medieval illuminated manuscripts from the Morgan's world-renowned collection.

exhibits.title: The Polonsky Exhibition: Origins of the Printed Book
exhibits.description: Discover the revolution of print through the NYPL's treasures, including a Gutenberg Bible and rare incunabula.

exhibits.title: Mapping NYC: From Nieuw Amsterdam to Now
exhibits.description: Trace the evolution of New York City through historic maps, from its Dutch colonial origins to the modern metropolis.

exhibits.title: Superfine: Tailoring Black Style
exhibits.description: Coming Spring 2026 - The annual Costume Institute exhibition exploring the history and influence of Black style in fashion.

exhibits.title: ImageFly HigherConcorde TourLet your imagination soar during this 20-minute tour aboard this technological marvel!Learn More

Mysteries from the Deep: Exploring Underwater ArchaeologyDive into the fascinating world of underwater archaeology, where cutting-edge technology and expert teams uncover mysteries hidden beneath the waves spanning thousands of years of history.Learn More

ImageAstro Live and Astronomy Night EventsViewers who have a passion for space science participate and meet astronauts, scientists, engineers, and other talents through these monthly virtual and onsite programs that explore relevant space-themed topics.Learn More

ImageGive More GoodMember BenefitsFrom free admission year-round and special discounts to exclusive event invitations, being an Intrepid Museum member has a long list of benefits, so you can get more out of every visit.Learn More

ImageYour Education DestinationLearning LibraryThe Intrepid Museum Learning Library offers thematic Museum content and lessons to learners of all ages and abilities. Historic photographs, oral histories and videos enrich educational lessons and resources covering different subjects.Learn More

ImageVirtual RealityApollo 11 & Beyond VR ExperienceClimb aboard a massive Saturn V rocket and blast off for adventure to witness humankind’s first inspiring steps on the Moon in an immersive virtual reality adventure.Learn More
Learn More
exhibits.description: We celebrate the people and technological innovations that have and continue to shape our world. Experience marvels such as the world’s first space shuttle, the world’s fastest commercial airliner, a nuclear-weapons-carrying submarine and dozens of military aircraft, including a supersonic spy plane—all displayed in and around the National Historic Landmark aircraft carrier,Intrepid.
